description:
With its compact and lightweight design, dual textured grip, Scandi ground blade and rugged sheath, this knife is a great backcountry companion. Everyone from young hikers to seasoned bushcrafters will find it useful when they spend time in the great outdoors.

  • Compact form factor packs well and lets you do easy detail work
  • Dual textured handle provides a comfortable and secure grip
  • Scandi ground blade is great for a variety of outdoor tasks
  • Flat ground spine acts as a perfect scraper for use with a fire steel
  • Rugged polypropylene sheath protects the edge, has a drain/lanyard hole and positive retention
name: Mora Eldris Light Duty Knife
